entry.source: {F812}Ring of Gaea member\0{F87A,53}{F813,1,404321}If we allow the Ashura-kai to run{F801}Tokyo, the precious survivors will{F801}suffer and become corrupted.{F801}{F802}That is why the Ring of Gaea must{F801}change Tokyo.{F801}{F802}Tokyo must be ruled by the strong.{F801}That gives us all a chance for true{F801}equality.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ring of Gaea member\0{F87A,53}{F813,1,404321}If we allow the Ashura-kai to run{F801}Tokyo, the precious survivors will{F801}suffer and become corrupted.{F801}{F802}That is why the Ring of Gaea must{F801}change Tokyo.{F801}{F802}Tokyo must be ruled by the strong.{F801}That gives us all a chance for true{F801}equality.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ring of Gaea member\0{F87A,53}{F813,1,404302}Now is the time to release Tokyo{F801}from the reign of the Ashura-kai!{F801}{F802}The Ring of Gaea will bring change!{F801}{F802}Tokyo must be ruled by the strong.{F801}That gives us all a chance for true{F801}equality.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ring of Gaea member\0{F87A,53}{F813,1,404302}Now is the time to release Tokyo{F801}from the reign of the Ashura-kai!{F801}{F802}The Ring of Gaea will bring change!{F801}{F802}Tokyo must be ruled by the strong.{F801}That gives us all a chance for true{F801}equality.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ring of Gaea member\0{F87A,53}{F813,1,404311}Can you imagine living in a Tokyo{F801}dominated by Tayama?{F801}{F802}The Ring of Gaea offered you a great{F801}future, a future where only the{F801}strong will rule.{F801}{F802}Your choice will lead you all to a{F801}tragic end. Your fate as demon{F801}fodder awaits...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ring of Gaea member\0{F87A,53}{F813,1,404311}Can you imagine living in a Tokyo{F801}dominated by Tayama?{F801}{F802}The Ring of Gaea offered you a great{F801}future, a future where only the{F801}strong will rule.{F801}{F802}Your choice will lead you all to a{F801}tragic end. Your fate as demon{F801}fodder awaits...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ring of Gaea member\0{F87A,53}{F813,1,404343}Our goals for Tokyo will be realized{F801}once we seize the Yamato Perpetual{F801}Reactor...{F801}{F802}That is what Lady Yuriko said, but I{F801}don't really know what she actually{F801}meant by it.{F801}{F802}I will dedicate all my strength into{F801}this mission to take control of the{F801}reactor!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ring of Gaea member\0{F87A,53}{F813,1,404343}Our goals for Tokyo will be realized{F801}once we seize the Yamato Perpetual{F801}Reactor...{F801}{F802}That is what Lady Yuriko said, but I{F801}don't really know what she actually{F801}meant by it.{F801}{F802}I will dedicate all my strength into{F801}this mission to take control of the{F801}reactor!{F801}
